org.jacpfx.rcp.components.managedFragment

Class ManagedFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jacpfx.rcp.components.managedFragment.ManagedFragment

  • public class ManagedFragment
extends java.lang.Object
    The ManagedFragment handles creation of managed dialog components. A managed Fragment is part of an UIComponent, it has always a UIComponent as a parent element (normally the caller component), it has full access to DI injection (services, etc.) and it can be used as managed node or JACPModal dialog.
    Author:
    Andy Moncsek
